docs.title: assessment-creator python package
docs.text:
This package is meant to create assesment by web scrapping.

  • PYPI link for this package - locdataMAC

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
installation steps

First let's do an easy pip installation of the library by running the following command - 

pip install assesment-creator

docs.title: Creating activities.json file
docs.text: example Args Type Description Nothing nothing No argument is requied for start method Returns Type Description File activities.json After pressing ctrl+c, it should return activities.json file

docs.title: Generating data.json file
docs.text: example Args Type Description path str input path of activiries.json file Returns Type Description File data.json return data.json file

docs.title: Creating data folder and geting final file.
docs.text: example Args Type Description path str valid url link filename str any word file name Returns Type Description str str returns data folder and with data folder final scraped file
